name: AGJ 2022 - Hot Potato
description:
Theme is OVER SATURATED.

Get the enemy to hold onto the ball for 30 seconds, then find the exit !

WASD to move.
Right mouse button to target.
Left mouse button to throw the spud.

5 levels - lots of bugs - have a big list of things to do for the next build, such as players impact animation, restarting levels when you fall into a pit, adding speed boosts, some ragdolls etc
